item.description: Kellie, I have been sorting out my old slides, mainly from the 70s and 80s. I have the slides and a projector but I would need a white screen or flat surface to show then. If anyone is interested in seeing some or all of these, I have pictures of the following:- Europe Norway - Romsdal Scotland - Skye, Hoy Wales - Llanberis, Gogarth, Tremadog England - Lakes, Grit, Limestone France - Provence, Chamonix Alps Switzerland - Handeg, Bregalia Italy - Mello America NH - Various NY - Gunks WY - Devil's Tower CO - The Diamond, Flatirons, Eldo, etc. CA - Tuolumne, El Cap Nose,
item.name: Foster climbing barn
